Argument.Name: domainName
Argument.Description: The name of the new domain

Argument.Name: domainType
Argument.Description: The type of the new domain. Currently supported values: 'RADIUS', 'LDAP'

Argument.Name: maxRetries
Argument.Description: Specifies how many times authentication is retried if the domain is unreachable

Argument.Name: connectionTimeout
Argument.Description: The time (in seconds) before an authentication attempt is considered as timed out
